html.description: Timothy Doner was hailed as a prodigy for linguistic proficiency. But, he says, you can be fluent and still struggle to understand language.
html.keywords: timothy doner, language, culture, speech, fluency, communication
html.title: Why I taught myself 20 languages — and what I learned about myself |

oembed.html: Timothy Doner started teaching himself to speak in other languages when he was 13, and was quickly hailed as a prodigy for his linguistic proficiency. But as he soon realized, there's more to fluency than being able to barter over kebabs in Arabic or order from a menu in Hindi.
oembed.title: Why I taught myself 20 languages — and what I learned about myself in the process
